comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hospital_of_the_New_York_Women's_Le... Hospital of the New York Women's League for Animals

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&client=firefox-a&q=350... indicates that the building is still there. The Hospital of the New York Women's League for Animals became the Animal Medical Center in 1959 and moved to a new building in 1962. See www.amcny.org/about-amc/history. The organization is celebrating its centenary this year. See www.avma.org/onlnews/javma/aug10/100801a.asp

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Bruce Blair was the resident veterinarian. I moved the article to the current name of the organization: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_Medical_Center_of_New_York

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks to all for the great information on Hospital of the New York Women's League for Animals. JE Piper: We always enjoy seeing your "rephotography" images.
